 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָדַד‎</span>] **verb** ==be sharp, keen== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חֲדַד‎</span>; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִדֵּד‎</span> ***sharpen***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be sharp*** and ***sharpen***; Assyrian Pi\`el <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***uddudu***</u></abbr>, ***sharpen***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pr 174, W 121</sup>) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחַדּ֫וּ מִזְּאֵבֵי עֶרֶב‎</span> consecutive [[Hab.1.8|Hab 1:8]] ***are keener than evening wolves*** (of impetuous Chaldean horses). **Hiph\`il** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵחֵד‎</span> ([[BDB#Che|Che]] Or [[BDB#Brd|Brd]]) or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחֵד‎</span> ([[BDB#Näg|Näg]] compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>§ 123 a, R</sup>), insert [[Isa.44.12|Isa 44:12]] after [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]]: the smith ***sharpeneth*** an axe. **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּחַדָּה‎</span> [[Ezek.21.14|Ezek 21:14]]; [[Ezek.21.15|Ezek 21:15]]; [[Ezek.21.16|Ezek 21:16]] ***be sharpened*** (in all, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span>). — See also 1. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חדה‎</span>. 



 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָדָה‎</span>] **verb** ==be or grow sharp==; — 

**Qal** ***grow sharp***, ***Imperfect*** with apocope = jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָ֑חַד‎</span> [[Prov.27.17|Prov 27:17]] a; **Hiph\`il** ***sharpen*** (figurative), ***Imperfect apoc***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַ֫חַד‎</span> [[Prov.27.17|Prov 27:17]] b; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּרְזֶל בְּבֶרְזֶל יָ֑חַד וְאִישׁ יַחְד פְּנֵירֵֿעֵהוּ‎</span> ***let iron by means of iron grow sharp, and let a man sharpen the countenance*** (presence, bearing) ***of his friend***; — so [[BDB#Ki|Ki]]<sup>Michl. 126 a</sup> [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Lgb i, 373 f.</sup>, compare [[BDB#Str|Str]]. (who however makes both forms Hiph\`il)
